website_summaries.verdict: With wide-opening jaws, these clippers are suitable for users with very thick nails or toenail fungus.
pros: Effective and easy to use, these are the clippers for you if you want a no-nonsense design that will get the job done with no bells and whistles
The blades are sharp and well-made, so won't have trouble getting through hard nails
cons: Difficult for some users to grip

customer_reviews.title: Good performance and good value
customer_reviews.text: I have very thick toenails as a result of the dreaded fungus. Normal clippers are inadequate to tackle the sheer bulk of the nail. The Saxhorn clipper was one of the less expensive options when I shopped for a beefy clipper so I gave it a try. It arrived promptly and certainly does the job.
customer_reviews.author: greg phillips

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to open latch, impossible to close
customer_reviews.text: The nail clipper is bulky and not that sharp. The biggest problem is that the latch requires a lot of hand grip strength to squeeze the two sides in to be unhooked. Once open, it requires even greater hand grip strength to squeeze the two sides in again to re-secure the latch. I finally managed to open it but now I can't close it. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Sunnygal by the lake

customer_reviews.title: Very dull, bad purchase
customer_reviews.text: So dull that it would't even cut toenails! I couldn't believe these were new. I have a similar one that is over 20 years old and cuts better. Don't buy this one!
customer_reviews.author: bravi

customer_reviews.title: the best on the market
customer_reviews.text: These nippers are, by far, the best on the market. Quality made, easy on the hands, super sharp blades with a built in nail file! Who could ask for more? I will be purchasing more of these for family and friends. Thank you for making a quality product!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Kelsay

customer_reviews.title: Decent product
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great pair of clippers...my only complaint is the the hung holding them shut is too short to latch but since they come with a plastic sleeve to go over the tip to keep them closed then I can complain too much
customer_reviews.author: Steven Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: great clippers
customer_reviews.text: I had looked for these in stores, and couldn't find some of this quality
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Randall

customer_reviews.title: Good practical toenail cutters
customer_reviews.text: Good practical cutters. Purchased the same toenail clippers 20+ years ago and they have worked great. Misplaced they for several weeks, purchased a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Doula369

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price.Might not hold up a lifetime but sharp and percise out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: C. Katz

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: More junk from Amazon! The spring falls out every time you try to use it. Takes the strength of two gorillas to cut a simple finger nail. Junk
customer_reviews.author: C A

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They worked wonderful with torn ligaments in my thumb. I was able to cut my nails.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: So glad I did
customer_reviews.text: I was on the hunt for a pair for my Dad & when I found these, read the reviews & saw how cheap they were, I bought 2 pair! So glad I did; they are the best!
customer_reviews.author: TAMMIE

customer_reviews.title: Superior quality
customer_reviews.text: Very well made you can feel the weight . Works great.
customer_reviews.author: GFM

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Purchase
customer_reviews.text: quick shipping. Very good set Exactly as shown & described. Very Satisfied !!
customer_reviews.author: Mary ann

customer_reviews.title: Recommended.
customer_reviews.text: Cuts through the thickest toenails. Bought a second one, since i frequently mislay my stuff. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: james karl  krantz

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: well made and the best of 4 different pair I own
customer_reviews.author: mark osbon

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Nice set and came with a pouch. Works much better than traditional toe nail clippers.
customer_reviews.author: David N. Clary

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: would reccommend. helped with very thick toe nails that I couldnt even get a more expensive product to do
customer_reviews.author: Jackie C.

customer_reviews.title: Thick and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Brought this as a gift for my mom for Christmas and I also got her one from Walmart earlier. And she says this quality is way better than the Walmart one
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like this product, it does what it is designed to do.
customer_reviews.author: Harold

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised, just wish the handles were little longer.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Great clippers !
customer_reviews.text: They did the best job of cutting toenails. I had no trouble. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: wendy pendergast

customer_reviews.title: delivery
customer_reviews.text: product is fine but carrier continues to leave our pkgs at the base of our garage door where we csn run iver it!!
customer_reviews.author: vicki cunningham

customer_reviews.title: OK clippers
customer_reviews.text: Not as sharp as expected. But I have thick nails.......
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: I would buy this product again.
customer_reviews.text: Fits comfortable in your hands and is made really well.
customer_reviews.author: GG

customer_reviews.title: Great clippers
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and comes in a nice box to keep it in.
customer_reviews.author: Kara Bing

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is good quality, however the clippers are not very sharp.
customer_reviews.author: mariah95

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: works 123 on hangnails - dug it out - out of pain now!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality product. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: M. Rubio

customer_reviews.title: A little clunky but nice
customer_reviews.text: Great for toes but not fingers. Too clunky for cuticles around fingers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: But toenails cut fine.
customer_reviews.text: Work well. Cut nails. Well, not steel nails. But toenails cut fine.
customer_reviews.author: Caver.Adam

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not as good a quality as the first ones if bought from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Alive Sober Living

customer_reviews.title: It must be sued with care
customer_reviews.text: It is sharp, and it does what it is supposed to do. I gave it only 4 stars because it scares me to death. I worry about cutting off a piece of my toe. I say this because I am older, and have difficulty bending my legs to get a good position to clip my toenails. This is an excellent product, but it must be used with care
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Great Clippers !
customer_reviews.text: Terrific - just what I was looking for - thank you !!
customer_reviews.author: Grace Notes

customer_reviews.title: ... heavy duty nail clippers and these are not as good as my regular clippers
customer_reviews.text: I was look for heavy duty nail clippers and these are not as good as my regular clippers. I would actually give this a negative star if I could. I generally don't post a review unless I like something but these were not at all useful to me and a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy E. Burrows

customer_reviews.title: Opens wide is sharp and is perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I was trying to use the larger size of the nail clipper most associated with finger nail clipping. With my deformed nails it was a joke. This Saxhorn is the real deal. Opens wide is sharp and is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Captain Shaft

customer_reviews.title: so good. I have rather easily been able to trim ...
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. I have rather easily been able to trim the remnants of my fungus-infested large toe nails. To be fair, these toe nails have already been treated several times by a podiatrist, and thus are not as thick as they once were. Hence, the "hedged" rating.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If I had known- would not have purchased
customer_reviews.text: They are ok but what I don't like is if you lose the plastic guard for the tip- you have some dangerous laying around. If my kids were still young this would be returnred. They are not collapseable
customer_reviews.author: rosemary

customer_reviews.title: awesome clippers
customer_reviews.text: finally found some clippers that actually works. they do a great job on my toe nails without having to work a little harder to clip them. I have tried different toenail clippers that claim to work great but theses really do. best toenail clipper I have ever own.
customer_reviews.author: arnold

customer_reviews.title: So happy I chose this nail Nipper
customer_reviews.text: So happy I chose this nail Nipper. The quality far exceeds the money I paid for this. The bag to hold the Nipper in comes in very handy. Must be very careful with this as it is very sharp. The handles are textured to prevent slippage in hands. If there is anything negative to say about this Nipper it's the plastic cover for the tip. It can be lost if not careful with it.
customer_reviews.author: davcar

customer_reviews.title: Got a Bad One
customer_reviews.text: The first one fell apart right away. The replacement (promptly and courteously handled by Amazon and the supplier) is working fine with no problems. The reason for four stars and not five is that the Nipper does not have a close-and-lock function. One must keep the silicone nose piece at hand when putting it away.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie A. Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Knock off
customer_reviews.text: Hard to resecure handles. If you open to wide spring falls off. Cheap knock off of original. Still cuts though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cut heavy toe nails
customer_reviews.text: Maneuverable and cuts toe nails cleanly with not much effort.
customer_reviews.author: Carl G. Holmlblad

customer_reviews.title: Careful of spring
customer_reviews.text: The product works but intially very stiff then the spring fell out replaced it and us d some oil it performs good
customer_reviews.author: Drogo of house Vaughan Rotties rule

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful to have sharp clippers, but not so sharp it would cut use. Love them, good product!
customer_reviews.author: Russ Williamson

customer_reviews.title: Even for the big guys.
customer_reviews.text: Needed something for my hooves - this does the trick - really sharp and cut them easily.
customer_reviews.author: Edmund Galicki Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: My nails are sometimes thick, and these nippers work better than other clippers
customer_reviews.author: Ican1994

customer_reviews.title: Okay - but hard work.
customer_reviews.text: Good value - but quite stiff. Not easy to cut with.... However they do cut extremely well once you master the strength to clip.............
customer_reviews.author: Georgia Harbeck

customer_reviews.title: It turns out that I already had this clipper. ...
customer_reviews.text: It turns out that I already had this clipper. It works well so now I Can have one for each foot. Just kidding!
customer_reviews.author: Eileen Eleanor

customer_reviews.title: Not for thick nails
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't get anywhere with this product. It would not cut my nails.
customer_reviews.author: R. Carnovale

customer_reviews.title: This saved our marriage!
customer_reviews.text: Sharp and easy to use cuts through nails easy peasy!
customer_reviews.author: Gerard Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the money. Very sharp so they easily cut difficult nails. Come with drawstring pouch for storage and seem to be well made. Pointed ends and wide opening.
customer_reviews.author: De

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy clippers
customer_reviews.text: My husband had a set of clippers like these that he has had for 14 years and they finally broke. So when I saw these I got them for him. He is very pleased with them. He says they are sharp and cuts his nails really well. The clippers come in the black bag that you see pictured. The clippers feel good in my hands and they are heavy but not so heavy as to make using them a problem..
customer_reviews.author: Susan Gent

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: It is a quality product made with good materials. I have some trouble getting the very ends of my nails clipped, though.
customer_reviews.author: IcedT

product_meta.title: A Star Nail nipper toenail clippers for thick and ingrown toe nail – heavy duty nail and cuticle clippers – stainless steel
product_meta.description:
Nail Clipper for thick toenail

Powerful Curved Blades 
Makes cutting thickened or ingrown toenails and trimming the hangnails easily. 

Easy Grip with Unique Handle
Easy grip and smooth control, the handle with ridges is designed to increase traction and avoid finger slippage. 

Built-in Nail File
Integrated with a nail file, easy to file your nail, no hurry to find instead. 

Bonus Storage Bag 
Protect the nail nipper and easy for storage and carrying. 

LIFETIME GUARANTEE
Lifetime worry-free guarantee from Saxhorn, professional technical support and always satisfied customer service.

Products Details
Dimension :4.92'' x 2.36''x 0.41''
Net Weight: 2.1 ounces

What's in the box
1xToenail Clipper
1xVelcro Pouch
feature_bullets: Powerful curved blade make nail nipper EFFECTIVE for thick and tough nails
Unique handle design make Saxhorn toenail clippers EASY for grip
Built-in Nail File is HANDY when a separate nail file is not available
Bonus storage bag PROTECTS the stainless steel toenail clipper
